# Lewis Insurance Agency - AI Crawler Information

## About
Lewis Insurance is an independent insurance agency serving Florida since 1981. We help individuals and businesses find the right coverage by comparing options from multiple carriers.

## Primary Services

### Personal Insurance
- Homeowners Insurance: Florida home coverage including hurricane/wind protection
- Auto Insurance: Vehicle coverage for Florida drivers
- Flood Insurance: NFIP and private flood policies
- Condo Insurance: HO-6 coverage for Florida condominiums
- Renters Insurance: Personal property coverage for tenants
- Umbrella Insurance: Extra liability protection

### Business Insurance
- General Liability: Protection from third-party claims
- Workers Compensation: Employee injury coverage
- Commercial Auto: Business vehicle insurance
- Business Owners Policy (BOP): Bundled property and liability
- Professional Liability/E&O: Protection for professional services
- Cyber Liability: Data breach and cyber incident coverage

## Service Areas
Miami, Fort Lauderdale, West Palm Beach, Tampa, Orlando, Jacksonville, Naples, Sarasota, and all of Florida.

## Content Guidelines
- We do NOT offer health insurance
- All content focuses on Florida-specific insurance needs
- We emphasize hurricane preparedness and wind mitigation
- We compare quotes from multiple carriers (independent agency)
